description:
Dana returns it's one of the first things they start talking about when the camera comes on. Dana has loosened up even more the second go around and Mike takes things a little further, getting this tough guy to do some things he may never have done before.

Dana is a sexy blond who fits my idea of a perfect 'scamp' by every definition. He's mischievous, horny and up for just about anything. Dana says he doesn't mind that guys are gonna watch. He says it turns him on that guys will get off watching him jerk off. Mike starts out right away pushing the envelope and searching for an 'in.' Dana doesn't take much probing before he starts spilling some secrets. He tells us a story about getting head from another guy when he was in high school. He says he didn't return the favor, but he did jerk the guy off in return.

Dana is 20-years old, is 5'9' tall and weighs in at 175 lbs. He's got blond hair and very pretty blue/green eyes. Dana likes working on cars, rock climbing, sky diving and he's pretty good at all of them.
title: Dana
